name: The Last Camp
description:
Survive in an open world full of other players and zombies. Encounter other players' camps and raid them to steal their crafting materials. Craft weapons and defenses to protect your own camp from attacks! Discover what's left of ruined civilization and what caused the cataclysm many years ago.

Features:
- Action packed top down shooting gameplay with simple controls.
- PvP multiplayer against other players who explore the wasteland at the same time.
- Encounter other players' camps in a wasteland and attack them to steal their crafting materials.
- Craft weapons and defenses to protect your own camp.
- Uncover the mystery behind what caused the cataclysm many years ago.

The Last Camp is completely free to play, however, it has some optional in-app purchases. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases on your device.
